title: Can't log into my account
body: I  had a laptop and i logged out of it, because i sold it.  Now that i'm trying to log in on my desktop,it won't let me. Worst part, i can't create another account.

replies.body:
Hmmm...if it keeps giving you an invalid username/password pop-up then there might be something else wrong entirely.

The best step you can take is to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) over to us!  One of our Account Recovery Specialists can look into your account and make sure you can access it again!
